fluff.name: Artificier
entries: Masters of unlocking magic in everyday objects, artificers are supreme inventors. They see magic as a complex system waiting to be decoded and controlled. Artificers use tools to channel arcane power, crafting temporary and permanent magical objects. To cast a spell, an artificer could use {@item materials d'alquímia|PHB} to create a potent elixir, {@item calligrapher's supplies|PHB} to inscribe a sigil of power on an ally's armor, or {@item tinker's eines|PHB} to craft a temporary charm. La Màgia de l'Artificirs is tied to their tools and their talents.

entries.name: Arcane Science
entries: In the world of Eberron, arcane magic has been harnessed as a form of science and deployed throughout society. Artificers reflect this development. Their knowledge of magical devices, and their ability to infuse mundane items with magical energy, allows the grand magical projects of Eberron to continue running. During the Last War, artificers were marshaled on a massive scale. Many lives were saved because of the inventions of brave artificers, but also countless lives were lost because of the mass destruction that artificers' creations unleashed.

entries.name: Seekers of New Lore
entries: Nothing excites an artificer quite like uncovering a new metal or discovering a source of elemental energy. In artificer circles, new inventions and strange discoveries create the most excitement. Artificers who wish to make a mark must find something fresh, rather than uncover someone else's work.

This drive for novelty pushes artificers to become adventurers. Eberron's main travel routes and populated regions have long since been explored. Thus, artificers take to the edge of civilization in hopes of making the next great discovery in arcane research.

entries.name: Creating an Artificier
entries: When creating an artificer character, think about your character's background and drive for adventure. Does the character have a rival? What is the character's relationship with the artisan or artificer who taught the basics of the craft? Talk to your DM about the role played by artificers in the campaign, and what sort of organizations and NPCs you might have ties to.

entries.name: Quick Build
entries: You can make an artificer quickly by following these suggestions. First, put your highest ability score in Intel·ligència, followed by Constitució or Destresa. Second, choose the {@background guild artisan} background.

entries.name: Artificers in Other Worlds
entries: Eberron is the world most associated with artificers, yet the class can be found throughout the multiverse. In the Regnes Oblidats, for example, the island of Lantan is home to many artificers, and in the world of Dragonlance, tinker gnomes are often members of this class. The strange technologies in the Barrier Peaks of the World of Greyhawk have inspired some folk to walk the path of the artificer, and in Mystara, various nations employ artificers to keep airships and other wondrous devices operational. In the City of Sigil, artificers share discoveries from throughout the cosmos, and one in particular—the gnome inventor named Vi—runs a multiverse-spanning business from there. In the worldcity Ravnica, the Izzet League trains numerous artificers, the destructiveness of whom is unparalleled in other worlds, except by the tinker gnomes of Krynn.

entries.name: Regla Opcional: Competència amb Armes de Foc
entries: The creation and operation of gunpowder weapons have been discovered in various corners of the D&D multiverse. If your Dungeon Master uses the rules on firearms in the Guia del Mestre de Masmorres (p. 267) and your artificer has been exposed to the operation of such weapons, your artificer is proficient with them.

classFeature.name: Andròmines Màgiques
entries: A nivell 1, you learn how to invest a spark of magic into mundane objects. To use this ability, you must have {@item eines de lladre|PHB} or {@item eines d'artesania|PHB} in hand. You then touch a Tiny nonmagical object com a acció and give it one of the following magical properties (escull):

items: The object sheds bright light in a 5-foot radius and dim light for an additional 5 feet.

Whenever tapped by a creature, the object emits a recorded message that can be heard fins a 10 peus away. You utter the message when you bestow this property on the object, and the recording can be no more than 6 seconds long.
The object continuously emits your choice of an odor or a nonverbal sound (wind, waves, chirping, or the like). The chosen phenomenon is perceivable fins a 10 peus away.
A static visual effect appears on one of the object's surfaces. This effect can be a picture, up to 25 words of text, lines and shapes, or a mixture of these elements, as you like.

entries: The chosen property lasts indefinitely. Com a acció, you can touch the object and end the property early.

You can bestow magic on multiple objects, touching one object each time you use this feature, though a single object can only bear one property at a time. The maximum number of objects you can affect with this feature at one time is equivalent al teu modificador d'Intel·ligència (mínim d'1 object). If you try to exceed your maximum, the oldest property immediately ends, and then the new property applies.

classFeature.name: Regla Opcional: Competència amb Armes de Foc
entries: Els secrets de la pòlvora han estat descoberts en múltiples racons del multivers de D&D. Si el/la/li MM emprea les normes de les armes de foc del {@book capítol 9|DMG|9|Firearms} de la {@book Guia del Mestre de Masmorres|DMG} i el teu artificier les ha vist funcionar, el teu artificier hi té competència.

classFeature.name: Llançament de Conjurs
entries: Has estudiat com funciona la màgia i com canalitzar-la a través d'objecte. Així, saps com llançar conjurs. Per la gent externa no sembla que llancis conjurs com de normal: sembla que facis meravelles mitjançant objectes mundans o invencions estrafolàries.

entries.name: Eines Necessàries
entries: Produeixes els teus conjurs d'artificier via les teves eines. Has de tenir un focus arcà, com ara unes {@item eines de lladre|phb} o algunes {@item eines d'artesania|phb|artisan's tool} per a llançar conjurs amb el teu tret de Llançament de Conjurs (quan el conjur tingui un component 'M'). Has de tenir competència amb l'eina per emprar-la així. Consulta el {@book capítol 5|PHB|4}, "Equipament," del {@book Manual del Jugador|PHB} per trobar descripcions d'aquestes eines.
Quan aprenguis el tret Infusionar Objecte a nivell 2, també pots emprar qualsevol objecte que tingui una Infusió teva com a focus arcà.

entries.name: La Màgia de l'Artifici
entries: As an artificer, you use tools when you cast your spells. When describing your spellcasting, think about how you're using a tool to perform the spell effect. If you cast {@spell curar ferides} using {@item materials d'alquímia|PHB}, you could be quickly producing a salve. If you cast it using {@item tinker's eines|PHB}, you might have a miniature mechanical spider that binds wounds. When you cast {@spell poison spray}, you could fling foul chemicals or use a wand that spits venom. The effect of the spell is the same as for a spellcaster of any other class, but your method of spellcasting is special.

The same principle applies when you prepare your spells. As an artificer, you don't study a spellbook or pray to prepare your spells. Instead, you work with your tools and create the specialized items you'll use to produce your effects. If you replace {@spell curar ferides} with {@spell escalfar el metall}, you might be altering the device you use to heal—perhaps modifying a tool so that it channels heat instead of healing energy.

Such details don't limit you in any way or provide you with any benefit beyond the spell's effects. You don't have to justify how you're using tools to cast a spell. But describing your spellcasting creatively is a fun way to distinguish yourself from other spellcasters.

entries.name: Trucs (Conjurs de nivell 0)
entries: A nivell 1, coneixes 2 trucs (escull) de la {@filter llista de conjurs de l'artificier|spells|level=0|class=Artificer}. A nivells superiors, aprendràs més trucs de artificer (escull), que pots veure a la Columna de Trucs Coneguts de la taula de Artificer.
Quan puges de nivell en aquesta classe, pots substituir un dels trucs d'artificier que coneixer per un altre de la llista de conjurs de l'artificier.

entries.name: Preparar i Llançar Conjurs
entries: La taula d'Artificer mostra les ranures de conjur que tens per llançar els conjurs d'artificier. Per a llançar conjurs d'artificier, has de gastar una ranura de conjur del nivell equivalent o superior al del conjur. Recuperes totes les ranures de conjur quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

Per a preparar la llista de conjurs que pots llançar, escull-los de la {@filter llista de conjurs de l'artificier|spells|class=Artificer}. Esculls un número de conjurs d'artificier equivalent al teu modificador d'Intel·ligència + la meitat del teu nivell d'artificier, arrodonint a la baixa (mínim d'1 conjur). Has de tenir una ranura del nivell d'un conjur per a poder preparar-lo.

Així, si ets un artificier de nivell 5, tens 4 ranures de nivell 1 i 2 ranures de nivell 2. Amb una Intel·ligència de 14, pots preparar-te 4 conjurs de nivell 1 o 2, en qualsevol combinació. Si et prepares el conjur de nivell 1 {@spell curar ferides}, el pots llançar gastant una ranura de nivell 1 o bé de nivell 2. Llançar un conjur no te l'elimina de la llista de conjurs preparats; només gasta la ranura.

Pots canviar la llista de conjurs preparats quan acabis un Descans Llarg. Preparar una nova llista de conjurs d'artificier requereix emprar les teves eines que son un focus arcà com a mínim 1 minut per cada conjur que et preparis.

entries.name: Habilitat de Llançament de Conjurs
entries: La teva habilitat de llançament de conjurs pels conjurs d'artificer és l'Intel·ligència; la teva comprensió sobre la teoria de la màgia et permet brandar aquests conjurs amb habilitat. Faràs servir l'Intel·ligència quan un conjur d'artificier parli de la teva habilitat de llançament de conjurs. També faràs servir el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència quan un conjur d'Intel·ligència mencioni: o una CD de salvada o una tirada d'impactar.

entries.name: Llançar com a Ritual
entries: Pots llançar un conjur d'artificier que tinguis preparat i que tingui l'etiqueta Ritual.

classFeature.name: Infusionar Objecte
entries: A nivell 2, aprèns a imbuir objectes mundans amb certes infusions màgiques. Els objectes màgics que crees amb aquest tret són prototips d'objectes permanents.

entries.name: Infusions d'Artificier
entries: Artificers have invented numerous magical infusions, extraordinary processes that rapidly create magic items. To many, artificers seem like wonderworkers, accomplishing in hours what others need weeks to complete.
The description of each of the following infusions details the type of item that can receive it, along with whether the resulting magic item requires attunement.
Some infusions specify a minimum artificer level. You can't learn such an infusion until you are at least that level.
Unless an infusion's description says otherwise, you can't learn an infusion more than once.

entries.name: Infusionar un Objecte
entries: Quan acabis un Descans Llarg, pots tocar un objecte no-màgic i imbuir-lo amb una de les teves infusions d'artificier; això el torna un objecte màgic. Una infusió només funciona en certes menes d'objectes: els mencionants a l'infusió d'objectes. Si l'objecte requereix harmonitzar-s'hi, pots harmonitzar-t'hi a l'instant quan l'infusiones. Si decideixes harmonitzar-t'hi més endavant, ho has de fer com de costum (consulta "Harmonització" al capítol 7 de la {@book Guia del Mestre de Masmorres|DMG}).

La teva infusió roman a l'objecte indefinidament, excepte: el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència (mínim d'1) dies després de la teva mort; o si substitueixes el teu coneixement d'una infusió per un altre.

Pots infusionar més d'un objecte no-màgic quan acabis un Descans Llarg; el màxim apareix a la columna d'Objectes Infusionats de la taula d'Artificier. Has de tocar cada objectes, i cada infusió teva només pot estar en un sol objecte alhora. A més, ningun objecte pot dur més d'una infusió teva alhora. Si sobrepasses aquest límit, l'infusió teva més vella a l'objecte s'esvaneix i la nova s'aplica.
Si una infusió acaba en un objecte que conté altres coses, com ara una bossa de contenció, els seus continguts apareixen sense malmetre's al seu espai i al seu voltant.

classFeature.name: Infusions Sabudes
entries: Quan reps aquest tret, esculls 4 infusions d'artificier que aprèns de la secció "{@filter Infusions d'Artificier|optionalfeatures|feature type=ai|source=ERLW}" del final de la descripció de la classe. Aprèns infusions adicionals (escull) quan puges de nivell en aquesta classe; consulta la columna Infusions Sabudes de la taula d'Artificier per a saber quan.
Quan puges de nivell en aquesta classe, pots substituir una de les infusions d'artificier que coneixes per una de nova.

classFeature.name: Artificier Especialista
entries: A nivell 3, esculls quina especialització adoptar. Cadascuna està detallada al final de la descripció de la classe. La teva elecció t'otorga trets als nivells 5, 9 i 15.

classFeature.name: L'Eina adequada per la Feina
entries: A nivell 3, aprèns com produïr exactament l'eina que et cal. Amb {@item eines de lladre|PHB} o {@item eines d'artesania|PHB}, pots crear, màgicament, un set d'{@item eines d'artesania|PHB} en un espai desocupat a 5 peus de tu. Crear-les requereix 1 hora de feina ininterrompuda, que pot passar durant un Descans Curt o Llarg. Les eines en sí són no-màgiques, però s'esvaeixen quan tornes a emprar aquest tret.

classFeature.name: Millora de Puntuació de Característica
entries: Quan arribes a nivell 4, pots incrementar en 2 una puntuació de característica, o bé incrementar en 1 dos puntuacions de característica (escull). No pots incrementar cap puntuació de característica per sobre de 20 mitjançant aquest tret.
Si el/la/li MM ho permet, pots no incrementar cap puntuació; a canvi, esculls un {@5etools tret|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Competència Versàtil
entries: {@i tret de nivell 4 (augmenta Millora de Puntuació de Característica)}

Quan obtinguis el tret Millora de Puntuació de Característica de la teva classe, pots substituir una de les teves competències d'habilitat (qualsevol; no ha de ser de la teva classe) per una altra de la llista d'habilitats de la teva classe a nivell 1.
Aquest canvi representa l'atrofia en una de les teves habilitats ja que et centres en una altra.

classFeature.name: Tret d'Artificier Especialista
entries: A nivell 5, obténs un tret gràcies al tret d'Artificier Especialista.

classFeature.name: Perícia en Eines
entries: Començant a nivell 6, el teu bonus de competència es duplica per les tirades d'habilitat que involucrin una eina amb que tinguis competència.

classFeature.name: Espurna de Geni
entries: Començant a nivell 7, aprèns a trobar solucions improvitzades sota pressió. Quan tu o una criatura que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu fa una tirada d'habilitat o de salvació pots, com a reacció, sumar el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència al resultat.
Pots emprar aquest tret un número de cops equivalent al teu modificador d'Intel·ligència (mínim 1 cop). En recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

Aquest canvi representa l'atrofia en una de les teves habilitats ja que et centres en una altra.

classFeature.name: Familiaritat amb Objectes Màgics
entries: Quan arribes a nivell 10, obténs un coneixement profund de com fabricar i utilitzar objectes màgics:

items: Pots harmonitzar-te amb fins 4 objectes màgics alhora.
Si fabriques un objecte màgic amb una raresa comú o poc comú, tardes 1/4 del temps normal i la meitat de l'or normal.

classFeature.name: Objecte Guarda-Conjurs
entries: A nivell 11, aprèns a emmagatzemar un conjur a dins d'un objecte. Quan acabis un Descans Llarg, toques una {@filter arma simple o marcial|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=martial weapon;simple weapon} o un objecte que puguis emprar com a focus arcà i hi emmagatzemes un conjur de nivell 1 o 2 de la {@filter llista de conjurs de l'artificier|spells|class=Artificer|cast time=action|level=1;2} amb una duració de llançament d'1 acció (no cal que el tinguis preparat).

Mentre una criatura dugui l'objecte pot, com a acció, produir el conjur que té a dins. Fa servir el teu modificador d'habilitat de llançament de conjurs. Si el conjur requereix concentració, la criatura s'ha de concentrar. You know the conjurs d'artificier {@spell detectar màgia} i {@spell identificar}, and you can cast them as rituals. When you gain a magic item from this feature, it reflects long hours of study, tinkering, and experimentation that allowed you to finally complete the item. You are assumed to work on this item in your leisure time and to finish it when you level up. You complete another item (escull) Quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe: 5th, 10th, 15th, and 20th level. The item you choose must be on the list for your current artificer level or a lower level. These magic items are detailed in the Guia del Mestre de Masmorres.

entries.name: Conjurs de Nivells 1 i Superiors Coneguts
entries: You know three 1st-level spells (escull) from the llista de conjurs de l'artificier (which appears at the end of this document). The Columna de Conjurs Coneguts de la taula de Taula d'Artificier mostra quan aprendràs més conjurs de artificer (escull) from this feature. Each of these spells must be of a level for which you have ranures de conjur on the Taula d'Artificier. A més, quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe, pots escollir un dels conjurs d'artificier you know from this feature and replace it with another spell from the llista de conjurs de l'artificier. The new spell must also be of a level for which you have ranures de conjur on the Artificer.

classFeature.name: Infondre Màgia
entries: Començant a nivell 4, you gain the ability to channel your conjurs d'artificier into objects for later use. When you cast an artificer spell with a casting time of 1 action, you can increase its casting time to 1 minute. Si ho fas and hold a nonmagical item throughout the casting, you expend a spell slot, but none of the spell's effects occur. Instead, the spell transfers into that item for later use if the item doesn't already contain a spell from this feature.

Any creature holding the item thereafter can use an action to activate the spell if the creature has an Intel·ligència score of at least 6. The spell is cast using your habilitat de llançament de conjurs, targeting the creature that activates the item. If the spell targets more than one creature, the creature that activates the item selects the additional targets. If the spell has an area of effect, it is centered on the item. If the spell's range is self, it targets the creature that activates the item.

When you infuse a spell in this way, it must be used within 8 hours. After that time, its magic fades and is wasted. You can have a limited number of infused spells at the same time. The number equals el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència.

classFeature.name: Harmonització Superior

classFeature.name: Servent Mecànic
entries: A nivell 6, your research and mastery of your craft allow you to produce a servent mecànic. The servant is a construct that obeys your commands without hesitation and functions in combat to protect you. Though magic fuels its creation, the servant is not magical itself. You are assumed to have been working on the servant for quite some time, finally finishing it during a short or long rest after you reach 6th level.

Select a Large beast with a challenge rating of 2 or less. The servant uses that beast's game statistics, but it can look however you like, as long as its form is appropriate for its statistics. It has the following modifications:

items: It is a construct instead of a beast.
It can't be {@condition charmed}.
It is immune to poison damage and the {@condition poisoned} condition.
It gains {@sense darkvision} amb un abast de 60 peus if it doesn't have it already.
It understands the languages you can speak when you create it, but it can't speak.

If you are the target of a atac cos a cos and the servant is within 5 feet of the attacker, pots, com a reacció, command the servant to respond, using its reaction to make a atac cos a cos against the attacker.

entries: The servant obeys your orders to the best of its ability. In combat, it rolls its own initiative and acts on its own.

If the servant is killed, it can be returned to life via normal means, such as with the {@spell revifar} spell. A més, over the course of a long rest, you can repair a slain servant if you have access to its body. It returns to life with 1 punt de vida at the end of the rest. If the servant is beyond recovery, you can build a new one with one week of work (eight hours each day) and 1,000 gp of raw materials.

classFeature.name: Andròmines Màgiques
entries: A nivell 1, you learn how to invest a spark of magic in objects that would otherwise be mundane. To use this ability, you must have {@item eines de lladre|PHB}, {@item tinker's eines|PHB}, or other {@item eines d'artesania|PHB} in hand. You then touch a Tiny nonmagical object com a acció and give it one of the following magical properties (escull):

items: The object sheds bright light in a 5-foot radius and dim light for an additional 5 feet.

Whenever tapped by a creature, the object emits a recorded message that can be heard fins a 10 peus away. You utter the message when you bestow this property on the object, and the recording can be no more than 6 seconds long.
The object continuously emits your choice of an odor or a nonverbal sound (wind, waves, chirping, or the like). The chosen phenomenon is perceivable fins a 10 peus away.
A static visual effect appears on one of the object's surfaces. This effect can be a picture, up to 25 words of text, lines and shapes, or a mixture of these elements, as you like.

entries: The chosen property lasts indefinitely. Com a acció, you can touch the object and end the property early.

You can give the magic of this feature to multiple objects, touching one object each time you use the feature, and a single object can bear only one of the properties at a time. The maximum number of objects you can affect with the feature at one time is equivalent al teu modificador d'Intel·ligència (mínim d'1 object). If you try to exceed your maximum, the oldest property immediately ends, and then the new property applies.

classFeature.name: Llançament de Conjurs
entries: You have studied the workings of magic, how to channel it through objects, and how to awaken it within them. As a result, you have gained a limited ability to cast spells. To observers, you don't appear to be casting spells in a conventional way; you look as if you're producing wonders through various items.

entries.name: Tools Required
entries: You produce your artificer spell effects through your tools. You must have a spellcasting focus—specifically {@item eines de lladre|phb} or some kind of artisan's tool—in hand when you cast any spell with this Spellcasting feature. You must be proficient with the tool to use it in this way. See chapter 5, "{@book Equipment|phb|6|eines}," in the Player's Handbook for descriptions of these tools.
After you gain the Infusionar Objecte feature a nivell 2, you can also use any item bearing one of your infusions as a spellcasting focus.

entries.name: Trucs
entries: A nivell 1, coneixes 2 trucs (escull) from the {@filter llista de conjurs de l'artificier|spells|class=artificer (uaar)}. A nivells superiors, aprendràs més trucs de artificer (escull), que pots veure a la Columna de Trucs Coneguts de la taula de Artificer.
When you gain a level en aquesta classe, you can replace one of the artificer cantrips you know with another cantrip from the llista de conjurs de l'artificier.

entries.name: Preparar i Llançar Conjurs
entries: The Taula d'Artificier mostra les ranures de conjur que tens per llançar els conjurs d'artificier. To cast one of your conjurs d'artificier of 1st level or higher, you must expend a slot of the spell's level or higher. Recuperes totes les ranures de conjur quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

Pots preparar la llista de conjurs d'artificier that are available for you to cast, choosing from the {@filter llista de conjurs de l'artificier|spells|class=artificer (uaar)}. Esculls un número de conjurs d'artificier equivalent al teu modificador d'Intel·ligència + half your artificer level, arrodonint a la baixa (mínim d'1 conjur). Has de tenir una ranura del nivell d'un conjur per a poder preparar-lo.

For example, if you are a artificier de nivell 5, you have four 1st-level and two 2nd-level ranures de conjur. With an Intel·ligència of 14, your list of prepared spells can include four spells of 1st or 2nd level, in any combination. Si et prepares el conjur de nivell 1 {@spell curar ferides}, you can cast it using a 1st-level or a 2nd-level slot. Casting the spell doesn't remove it from your list of prepared spells.

You can change your list of prepared spells quan acabis un Descans Llarg. Preparar una nova llista de conjurs d'artificier requires time spent in tinkering with your spellcasting focuses: at least 1 minute per spell level for each spell on your list.

entries.name: Habilitat de Llançament de Conjurs

You use your Intel·ligència whenever an artificer spell refers to your habilitat de llançament de conjurs. A més, you use el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència when setting the saving throw DC for an artificer spell you cast and when making an attack roll with one.

entries.name: Llançar com a Ritual
entries: You can cast an artificer spell as a ritual if that spell has the ritual tag and you have the spell prepared.

entries.name: La Màgia de l'Artifici
entries: As an artificer, you use tools when you cast your spells. When describing your spellcasting, think about how you're using a tool to perform the spell effect. If you cast {@spell curar ferides} using {@item materials d'alquímia|PHB}, you could be quickly producing a salve. If you cast it using {@item tinker's eines|phb}, you might have a miniature mechanical spider that binds wounds. When you cast {@spell poison spray}, you could fling foul chemicals or use a wand that spits venom. The effect of the spell is the same as for a spellcaster of any other class, but your method of spellcasting is special.

The same principle applies when you prepare your spells. As an artificer, you don't study a spellbook or pray to prepare your spells. Instead, you work with your tools and create the specialized items you'll use to produce your effects. If you replace {@spell curar ferides} with {@spell shocking grasp}, you might be breaking down the device you used to heal and creating an offensive item in its place—perhaps a gauntlet that lets you channel a surge of energy.

Such details don't limit you in any way or provide you with any benefit. You don't have to justify how you're using tools to cast a spell. But describing your spellcasting creatively is a fun way to distinguish yourself from other spellcasters.

classFeature.name: Infusionar Objecte
entries: A nivell 2, you gain the ability to imbue mundane items with certain magical infusions. The magic items you create with this feature are effectively prototypes of permanent items.

entries.name: Infusions Sabudes
entries: When you gain this feature, pick three infusions d'artificier to learn, choosing from the "{@filter Infusions d'Artificier|optionalfeatures|feature type=ai|source=UAArtificerRevisited}" section at the end of the class's description. You learn additional infusions (escull) Quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe, as shown in the Infusions Sabudes column of the Taula d'Artificier.
Quan puges de nivell en aquesta classe, you can replace one of the infusions d'artificier you learned with a new one.

entries.name: Infusionar un Objecte
entries: Quan acabis un Descans Llarg, you can touch a nonmagical object and imbue it with one of your infusions d'artificier, turning it into a magic item. An infusion works on only certain kinds of objects, as specified in the infusion's description. If the item requires attunement, you can attune yourself to it the instant you infuse the item, or you can forgo attunement so that someone else can attune to the item. If you decide to attune to the item later, you must do so using the normal process for attunement (see "{@book Attunement|dmg|7|attunement}" in the Guia del Mestre de Masmorres, page 136).

Your infusion remains in an item indefinitely, but when you die, the infusion vanishes after a number of days have passed equivalent al teu modificador d'Intel·ligència (mínim d'1 day). The infusion also vanishes if you give up your knowledge of the infusion for another one.

You can infuse more than one nonmagical object quan acabis un Descans Llarg; the maximum number of objects appears in the Infused Items column of the Taula d'Artificier. You must touch each of the objects, and each of your infusions can be in only one object at a time. If you try to exceed your maximum number of infusions, the oldest infusion immediately ends, and then the new infusion applies.

entries.name: Infusions d'Artificier
entries: Artificers have invented numerous magical infusions that rapidly create magic items. To the untrained, artificers seem like wonderworkers, accomplishing in hours what others need weeks to complete.
The description of each infusion tells you the type of item that can receive it. The description also tells you if the resulting magic item requires attunement.
Some infusions specify a minimum artificer level. You can't learn such an infusion until you are at least that level.
Unless an infusion's description says otherwise, you can't learn the infusion more than once.
See the {@filter Class Feature Options page|optionalfeatures|feature type=ai|source=UAArtificerRevisited} for the full list of infusions.
